1560684873_1AqPs23HT3V8rwqey5F5bXsLMUZUm.body: One issue with beaker/dat (which the developers say they are aware of and plan to address at some point) is the complete lack of privacy. It's very easy to which IP address has which content, and which IP address is looking for which content: https://fieldnotes.resistant.tech/privacy-and-p2p-protocols/

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Is there a zeronet-hosted version of the docs?
